recipe.title: Box Brownie Waffle Sundae Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 box ; brownie mix, prepared according to package instructions

steps.step: Place 4 large dollops of brownie batter in a preheated, greased waffle iron.
Cook for 2-3 minutes, until brownies are semi-firm to the touch.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Place 4 large dollops of brownie batter in a preheated, greased waffle iron.
Cook for 2-3 minutes, until brownies are semi-firm to the touch.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce.
